mapper.insert: insert into publicAffairs_counselor (classTeacher, status, schoolLevel, provinceLevel, caucusLaval, startTime, endTime, note, year) values (#{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{schoolLevel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{provinceLevel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{caucusLaval,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update publicAffairs_counselor set classTeacher = #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, schoolLevel = #{schoolLevel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, provinceLevel = #{provinceLevel,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, caucusLaval = #{caucusLaval,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, classTeacher, status, schoolLevel, provinceLevel, caucusLaval, startTime, endTime, note, year from publicAffairs_counselor where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, classTeacher, status, schoolLevel, provinceLevel, caucusLaval, startTime, endTime, note, year from publicAffairs_counselor
